docs.snippet: Cleveland's police union called for the suspension of a state law allowing people to carry firearms during the Republican National Convention but Ohio's governor said he was powerless to act despite heightened security concerns with the killing on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cleveland's police union called for the suspension of a state law allowing people to carry firearms during the Republican National Convention but Ohio's governor said he was powerless to act despite heightened security concerns with the killing on Sunday of three police officers in Louisiana.

headline.main: U.S. Shootings Heighten Security Concerns at Republican Convention
headline.print_headline: U.S. Shootings Heighten Security Concerns at Republican Convention

docs.snippet: A decorated ex-U.S. Marine sergeant opened fire on police in Baton Rouge on Sunday, killing three officers, nearly two weeks after the fatal police shooting of a black man there sparked nationwide protests, one of which was shattered by the massac...
docs.lead_paragraph: A decorated ex-U.S. Marine sergeant opened fire on police in Baton Rouge on Sunday, killing three officers, nearly two weeks after the fatal police shooting of a black man there sparked nationwide protests, one of which was shattered by the massacre of five Dallas policemen.

headline.main: Ex-U.S. Marine Kills Three Policemen in Racially Tense Baton Rouge
headline.print_headline: Ex-U.S. Marine Kills Three Policemen in Racially Tense Baton Rouge
